http://www.brattlefil...


Repertory Series!
Sense & Sensibility: The Films of Ang Lee
Eat Drink Man Woman

(1994) dir Ang Lee, w/ Sihung Lung, Yu-Wen Wang, Chien-lien Wu, Kuei-Mei Yang, Sylvia Chang, Winston Chao [123 min]
An aging Chinese chef moves in with his three unmarried daughters, who present an almost Jane Austen-esque archetype of single women: the broken hearted old-maid, the commitment-phobic career woman, and the naive and curious younger sister. The plot centers on an elaborate dinner every Sunday, which serves as the emotional catalyst for the generally tight-lipped family. Throughout the duration of the film the women encounter new partners who shape and change not only their lives, but that of their father as well.
